\left\{\begin{array}[]{lcl}\dot{x}_{n}&=&v_{n},\\ &&\\ \dot{v}_{n}&=&A(1-\frac{v_{n}T+D}{x_{n+1}-x_{n}})\\ &&\\ &&\quad-\frac{Z^{2}(v_{n}-v_{n+1})}{2(x_{n+1}-x_{n}-D)}-kZ(v_{n}-v_{per}),\end% {array}\right.

v_{n}^{0}=v^{0}=\left\{\begin{array}[]{l}\frac{A(1-D\rho)+kv_{per}}{A\rho T+k}% ,\quad\rho\leq\frac{1}{D+Tv_{per}},\cr\cr\frac{1-D\rho}{\rho T},\quad\rho\geq% \frac{1}{D+Tv_{per}},\end{array}\right.
